audioText: L'avocat portera une attention particulière à ce sujet délicat lors de la négociation du contrat commercial important.
question: What will the lawyer pay particular attention to during the important commercial contract negotiation?
options: Legal precedents and regulatory compliance issues
Financial terms and payment scheduling arrangements
Client confidentiality and professional ethics requirements
explanation: The text states 'L'avocat portera une attention particulière à ce sujet délicat lors de la négociation du contrat commercial important.' - The lawyer will pay particular attention to this delicate subject during the important commercial contract negotiation. 'Sujet' means subject/topic, 'portera' means will pay/carry, and 'délicat' means delicate.
source: Strategic noun coverage development - legal contract negotiations
